resources.string: Orgestrator needs to access your Google account for Drive access.
Connecting to Google Drive requires Google Play Services. Please install Google Play Services on your device and relaunch Orgestrator.
Orgestrator needs to access your Google account to talk to Google Drive.
No network connection was found. Please confirm your device is connected and relaunch Orgestrator.
Orgestrator requires Google Play Services. Please install Google Play Services on your device and relaunch this app.
